pages.title: about
pages.text: I would rather go with ANGER. 时代失语，所以要高声喧哗。 正在努力过一种 「去社交平台化」 的平衡生活，您可以通过电邮或私人联系方式找到我。 不保证任何即时通讯软件在主观上具备即时性。 欢迎对博客的文本进行多元阐释。 竭力抵抗虚无主义。臧否万物是轻巧的，重构是费力的。

;(function() { var $bar = $('.reading-progress-bar') if (!$bar.length) return //no progress bar found var supportsPassive = false try { var opts = Object.defineProperty({}, 'passive', { get: function() { supportsPassive = true } }) window.addEventListener('test', $.noop, opts) window.removeEventListener('test', $.noop) } catch (e) {} var $w = $(window) var $d = $(document) $d.ready(function() { window.addEventListener( 'scroll', function() { var wh = $w.height() var dh = $d.height() var st = $w.scrollTop() var percent = (st / (dh - wh)) * 100 percent = percent > 100 ? 100 : percent < 0 ? 0 : percent $bar.css('width', percent + '%') }, supportsPassive ? { passive: true } : false ) }) })()

Reading Progress for NexT Installation If you want to use the CDN instead of clone this repo, please jump to the Step 3. Step 1 → Go to NexT dir Change dir to NexT directory. There must be layout, source, languages and other directories: 123$ cd themes/next$ lsbower.json _config.yml docs gulpfile.coffee languages layout LICENSE.md package.json README.md scripts source test Step 2 → Get module Install module to source/lib directory: 1$ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-reading-progress source/lib/reading_progress Step 3 → Set it up Enable module in NexT _config.yml file: 1234reading_progress: enable: true color: "#37c6c0" height: 2px And, if you wants to use the CDN, then need to set: 123vendors: ... reading_progress: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/theme-next/theme-next-reading-progress@1/reading_progress.min.js Update 12$ cd themes/next/source/lib/reading_progress$ git pull

posts.title: VOL.01
posts.text: 无 一切将消散技术让难能可贵的东西变得轻巧起来，机械复制不耗费吹灰之力。效率的美名成为它正当性和合理性的来源，又借以新奇的面孔来让人瞠目好奇。接着就是那不可遏的繁衍生产。没有造物主，没有教条，这已完全被生产者客体化的物却一跃而起，跳到众生头上做了大主宰。担心它在追求猎奇的过程贬斥为流俗的手段？不，当技术凝结为一种裹挟人类精神世界的集合时，这巨兽足以把人类异化为自己的奴役，寄宿在妄图以意义对抗虚无、以定格对抗流变的躯体里，蚕食气力，讨求意义。一面欣然为自己的手脚不断添加义肢，一面在诸多新体验中丧失五感。要尼采不断踩踏我为人的自尊心，要追求强者的高傲优越感，要坚持审美的绝对主义，要小心谨慎地像个不敢踱步向前的原教旨主义。齐泽克说 ：「愤世嫉俗好过肤浅的乐观」。愤怒需要力气，我得全神贯注，得目不斜视地找寻魅影。

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
